PHRASE.LANG: Doll in the shape of a Japanese spirit representing things evil, frightening and powerful. [#Legal]
Figurine représentant un démon japonais symbole de force, de crainte et du mal.[#Legal]
Eine Puppe in Gestalt eines japanischen Geistes, der das Böse, das Furchterregende und Starke zugleich in sich vereint.[#Legal]
Una statuetta ispirata al demone giapponese che simboleggia male, terrore e potenza. [#Legal]
Muñeco con motivo de monstruo japonés símbolo de lo malo, lo horrible y lo fuerte. [#Legal]
悪いもの、恐ろしいもの、強いものを象徴する日本の妖怪をモチーフにした人形。[#Legal]
나쁜 것, 무서운 것, 강한 것을 상징하는 일본의 요괴를 모티프로 한 인형. [#Legal]
Doll in the shape of a Japanese spirit representing things evil, frightening and powerful. [#Legal]
以象徵邪惡、可怕和強大東西的日本妖怪為題材的公仔。[#Legal]
以象徵邪惡、可怕和強大東西的日本妖怪為題材的公仔。[#Legal]
Doll in the shape of a Japanese spirit representing things evil, frightening and powerful. [#Legal]
